title: Hi-Five (song)
text: "Hi-Five" is the fifth single by Japanese rock act <a href="Superfly%20%28band%29">Superfly</a>, and was the last single released prior to the band's debut <a href="Superfly%20%28Superfly%20album%29">self-titled album</a>. The main track was used in promotions for <a href="au%20%28mobile%20phone%20company%29">au</a>'s "<a href="LISMO">LISMO</a>" service in April 2008. The B-sides for the physical release of the album were three of the four tracks from their 2007 <a href="iTunes%20Store">iTunes Store</a> set released as "<a href="Live%20from%20Tokyo%20%28EP%29">Live from Tokyo</a>". "Hi-Five" ultimately reached the number 30 spot on the <a href="Oricon">Oricon</a> charts, while it went to number 7 on the <a href="Japan%20Hot%20100">Japan Hot 100</a>.
